about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate Full-Stack Developer with expertise in GIS systems, team leadership, and AI-powered automation tools

summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.paragraph1: I'm a Full-Stack Developer with extensive experience in modern web technologies and GIS systems. My journey began in the IDF tech units where I developed leadership skills while building complex web applications and GIS tools that serve critical operational needs.
summary.paragraph2: I specialize in React, Node.js, Next.js, and Python, with a particular passion for creating reusable libraries and automation tools. My experience spans from microservices architecture to AI-powered chatbots, always focusing on clean code and scalable solutions.
summary.paragraph3: Beyond technical skills, I'm passionate about mentoring developers, leading cross-functional teams, and bridging the gap between complex technical requirements and user-friendly solutions. I thrive in environments where I can combine technical expertise with strategic thinking.

strengths.title: Core Strengths
strengths.description: Combining deep technical knowledge with strong leadership abilities to deliver exceptional results in complex projects.
